TopicTitle: Test YT-10 contract, no "Test Part" option.

Articles.Content:
I've accepted the contract "Test LY-10 Small Landing Gear", met all the criteria, and right clicked on the landing gear, but no "Test Part" option comes up.

I've attempted this before manipulating the gear, an after toggling all options. At this point, I have no idea how I can complete this contract.
Open the landing gear, and close it again at that altitude.
Thank for the reply Alphasus. Are you saying that should work, or just is that a suggestion? I did try that, with no change.

These contracts should work fine if accepted in 1.0.5, but if they are from 1.0.4 then they can be broken and the only way to deal with them is to complete them via the debug menu (modkey(leftAlt/rightShift/Cmd)+F12).
Yeah, that must be it. I took a break and only started playing again recently. Thanks for the tip.
Glad I could help Alpaca, if you get any further issues please let us know

4 hours ago, Alpaca said:

Thank for the reply Alphasus. Are you saying that should work, or just is that a suggestion? I did try that, with no change.

Oh, I was saying that because I thought that you expected a test button. There is none. But, sal_vager is correct.
